description: Tags a contact or escalation plan. You can tag only contacts and escalation plans in the first region of your replication set.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact or escalation plan.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tags that you are adding to the contact or escalation plan. (dict) --- A container of a key-value name pair. Key (string) --- Name of the object key. Value (string) --- Value of the tag.
